data.title: Indigenous%20Science%20Fiction%20and%20Fantasy
data.meta_site_name: Monroe County Public Library, Indiana - mcpl.info
data.text: We respectfully acknowledge that Monroe County Public Library, in all of its iterations since 1818, was built and exists on land that has been, is still, and will continue to be rightfully occupied and nurtured by the Bodwéwadmik (Potawatomi), Kiikaapoi (Kickapoo), Lënape (Delaware), Myaamia (Miami), and Saawanwaki (Shawnee) Indigenous peoples, among others. View more details and resources.
